extDesc.message: This extension allows you to control Deezer from your browser.

options_page_tab_welcome_content.message: With it, you can quickly pause, resume or navigate through the music currently playing on Deezer. You'll no longer have to go back to the Deezer tab to watch that lolcat video! In its popup, it displays the album cover along with the the track's title and the artist's name. Several different styles can be chosen for the popup, to match everybody's needs. Want more? Drop me a line!

options_page_tab_welcome_contact_me_at.message: You can also contact me by mail

options_page_footer_not_endorsed.message: Deezer Control is not endorsed by Deezer
